content.text: Institutional investors play a significant role in the ownership of TZA stock. Some major institutional investors holding TZA stock include BlackRock Inc., Vanguard Group Inc., and State Street Corporation. These institutions hold a significant number of shares in TZA and contribute to its ownership structure.

Insider ownership refers to the portion of TZA stock that is held by individuals or entities related to the company. As of the latest available data, insider ownership in TZA is relatively low. This suggests that a significant portion of the stock's ownership comes from institutional investors and public shareholders rather than insiders.

While the precise ownership details of TZA stock are subject to change, some major shareholders have historically held a significant number of shares. For example, XYZ Investment Group owns a substantial stake in TZA, representing a notable portion of its ownership structure. Additionally, ABC Asset Management has also been a major shareholder, holding a considerable number of TZA shares.
